title: Ylang Ylang Restaurant and Juice Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Raw, Western, Juice bar, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Montezuma is a small quaint village at the tip of the Nicoya Peninsula. This restaurant is part of the Ylang Ylang Beach Resort, and it offers dining on the beach with ocean view. The menu includes vegan, raw food, and vegetarian sections. No red meat (has fish and chicken). Uses mainly organic produce. Will accommodate special diets with advance notice. Has Wi-Fi. Located 10-15 minute walk north on the beach from town.
streetAddress: Puntarenas, 700 meters North of the school
